title: of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Planning and
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Planning and 
Development) (Development for Accommodation of Displaced Persons) 
Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (planning development) (development accommodation displaced persons) regulation 2023

title: of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“Act of 2000” means the Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 

2000); 

“Council Directive” means Council Directive 2001/55/EC of 20 July 20011 
on minimum standards for giving temporary protection in the event of a mass 
influx of displaced persons and on measures promoting a balance of efforts 
between Member States 
the 
consequences thereof; 

in receiving such persons and bearing 

“Council Implementing Decision” means Council Implementing Decision 
(EU) 2022/382 of 4 March 20222 establishing the existence of a mass influx of 
displaced persons from Ukraine within the meaning of Article 5 of Directive 
2001/55/EC, and having the effect of introducing temporary protection; 

“displaced persons” means persons to whom temporary protection applies in 

accordance with Article 2 of the Council Implementing Decision; 

“temporary protection” has the same meaning as it has in the Council 

Directive.

title: of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of
heading: 3. The Act of 2000, other than sections 50, 50A, and 50B, shall not apply
text_raw:
3. The Act of 2000, other than sections 50, 50A, and 50B, shall not apply 
to the development described in the Schedule proposed to be carried out, for 
the purposes of providing accommodation to displaced persons, on behalf of 
the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth. 

1 OJ No. L 212, 7.8.2001, p.12 
2 OJ No. L 71, 4.3.2022, p.1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th May, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [251] 3

title: of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of
heading: Columb Barracks
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

 Columb Barracks 

 Ashe Road, Mullingar, Co. Westmeath 

Site: 

Address: 

Description: 

The project involves the supply and installation of 50 modular transitional 
homes, with a total capacity of 200 people, and associated site development 
works located in an existing courtyard setting within the campus of Columb 
Barracks, Ashe Road, Mullingar, Co. Westmeath. 

The scope of the project includes the assembly of prefabricated units and 
associated civil engineering work, comprising the preparation of the existing 
site to accommodate the modular units, extension of all services infrastructure 
including new connections to all required utilities, construction of in situ 
concrete base foundations for the modular units, creation of hardstanding areas 
throughout the site, formation of new site boundaries and extension of the site 
lighting. Also included in the project is the provision of semi- mature trees, 
specimen plants and screening hedges as part of overall landscaping. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [251] 

Part 2 

Proposed Site Layout Plan 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [251] 5 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 May, 2023. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [251]
